website_summaries.verdict: Good price point for a suction cup mount that works nicely with most models of GoPro cameras.
pros: Has a low profile so it will reduce problems with vibrations that some taller mounts have
Mounting arm does extend to give you some versatility in the types of shots you can create
Will give you a 270-degree rotation capability
Large diameter in the suction cup
cons: Build quality doesn't quite stand up to the same standards as official GoPro suction cup mount

customer_reviews.title: Nope, not working. 10$ wasted
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to write a positive review on this one. Especially after getting this message about who's behind the company and what's not. But the fact is - it doesn't work at all. Materials used are of good quality, there's a lot of customisation possible but the mount won't stick to anything - be it wood, metal, plastic or glass. At first I thought that maybe I'm using it wrong. But it turns out it's not the case. See the video comparison to the GoPro mount that I ended up buying. Maybe I'm just unlucky, but I bet things like that don't happen with the original mounts.
customer_reviews.author: Jakub Siemiatkowski

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This fell off the car after 10 mn of driving at only 30 miles/hour I lost my camera in a field and could not recover back Terrible experience !!!! I m not sure how the other reviews are putting a 4-5 stars for suction !! They are lying or have not really used it on the outside of a car . By the way in case you are wondering I really cleaned and prepared the car to put the suction on
customer_reviews.author: Mar Sam

customer_reviews.title: Solid and versitile little device
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my DJ Osmo Action to record hyperlapse videos while driving. It can be adjusted using the included arm and 90 degree mounting adapter. Very strong suction on steel and glass. I have no doubts about my camera remaining secure in most situations. So far I have no negatives to say about this thing. It is lighter than I expected out of the box, but seems very durable. I haven't had a chance to leave it inside my vehicle in hot temperatures or direct sunlight for extended periods yet (season), but this thing is a beast in the cold.
customer_reviews.author: Russ H

customer_reviews.title: It keeps falling off the car
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work. I have tried cleaning the surface where I attached it to my car, I tried attaching it to glass and paintwork, and all three times it ended up falling after 10 or 15 minutes easy ride. Luckily for me I had the camera attached with a line to the car just in case, and that saved my GoPros. Do not buy this product to use it in a car.
customer_reviews.author: Deagol

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with this product!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this product! Mounted a GoPro on my front fender to film some off-roading trails. Drove to and from the trails on the freeway with no issues. What impressed me the most was the way it handles the rough trails. Fast shipping and great product... Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use, VERY prone to vibration
customer_reviews.text: It's extremely difficult to get your camera into position with this mount since it's only adjustable in two directions. It really needs a swivel to be completely adjustable. However, it's worst problem is that it's so prone to vibration. Attaching this to my car window resulted in horrible jelly-roll distortion, the video was completely unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile.
customer_reviews.text: Super versatile do to the multiple mounting angles, the ability to use any branded accessory, and the reasonable price. The only drawback is the lack of any security or safety features. Higher end mounts will have a lanyard system so that if the suction is lost you don’t lose your equipment. While you could rig up your own safety cable this unit lacks one from the factory. Other than that I love this thing and now own several of them for use inside and outside of the car.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Glass

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: It works good but the surface has to be really flat and very clean. UPDATED REVIEW - BEWARE of damage to your GoPro! After using it ONLY 3 times for about 2-3 hours, this thing came crashing down with my gopro 6 damaging the lens! And, NO it was not suction issue, the thing holding suction cup broke!!! It just broke! Sun? Not idea, but it damaged my gopro!!! I would not trust this thing to hold expensive gopro. DO NOT use this on the outside of your vehicle as you may be very sorry. Look for something else, it will save you money and hustle!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great (and better than other "kit" type suction cups)
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a great suction cup for your GoPro, you want solid-build quality, and you want it to work well every time, look no further. I purchased this at the time I purchased a $20 mixed piece kit for my GoPro Hero 7 Black, which also came with a suction cup and to be frank, this product was much better, stronger, and solid-build than the kit suction cup. If you need a dedicated suction cup for your camera, this is the one to go with.
customer_reviews.author: M. Estrockito

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the Official suction
customer_reviews.text: What I like about this? It's cheaper and does get the job done for cheaper. Being on the go and limited with my budget for accessories, this was a no brainer and im glad I went with it. It stayed on the side of my car, and on my windshield for the 2 weeks on vacation. The suction power was really good and had confidence in this product to mount on the side of my car. I also had this mounted onto the airplane windows which are a bit flimsy, but it stayed up.
customer_reviews.author: L. AOT

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a month.
customer_reviews.text: Stick with the Gopro authentic brand, this product literally popped off while it was being adjusted on the vehicle windshield. Maybe due to heat, the plastic seems cheap, but, Thank goodness it wasn't outside on the car against road bumps and wind while filming. I own a gopro brand mount as well and haven't had a problem with that over 2 years. It stays on the inside windshield and performs flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Onyx Protective Services

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to moisten the suction cup
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed the product, it worked pretty well. I will say that the suction needs some moistening. I used it in a couple of different locations on the vehicle and found that it continued to fall off as the suction had gotten dry and dirty. With a little bit of water that was quickly fixed. I was only fortunate enough to find the GoPro after it had fallen off three times. That could have been a really bad day.
customer_reviews.author: michael bruno

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I used it for the first time this weekend with my Activeon CX action camera. The mount fit perfectly, and was a tight fit to the exterior of my vehicle. Stayed on tight during the 4 hours of offroading adventure through all types of terrain and water crossings, honestly can't imagine the "official GoPro" mount is any better than this. Highly recommend to anyone looking for a solid mounting option at a lower price than GoPro's version.
customer_reviews.author: James H

customer_reviews.title: 5 STAR GoPro Suction Mount
customer_reviews.text: BUY IT! I have used this on the inside of my windshield and on the outside of my car door. It has never fallen off the surface attached to.m, so from a suction standpoint it’s rock solid. My gopro8 is fiery easy to attach; literally takes a few short seconds. Love all the adjustments that can be made to get the needed camera angles. Once the adjustments are complete for the desired angle they are locked into place and do not loosen up. Buy this if you plan on getting footage from your vehicle with your GoPro.
customer_reviews.author: Johninphx

customer_reviews.title: No suction and impossible to position.
customer_reviews.text: This product is useless. The suction doesn’t work on glass. It doesn’t work on metal. It doesn’t work on anything. It’s also almost impossible to position it in any way the works for me. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S

customer_reviews.title: Quality made product giving OEM competition
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because the Original equipment GoPro unit failed me and the nut that holds the screw in place that mounts the camera had fell off and lost. I decided to try a competitor mount of good quality. This is my second purchase of a competitor mount. By far this has great quality compared to the china knock off mounts. I am very happy this mount is sturdy so I don't loose my GoPro's. This past weekend I put the mount in action and place the suction mount on my classic car on the side of the vehicle and guess what, I did not loose my GoPro and it worked perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Tomas

customer_reviews.title: Pretty strong suction cup
customer_reviews.text: Actually takes effort to remove after you undo the locking clasp. Much stronger than either of my cell phone mount suction cups, one of which keeps coming off. It is quite a bit larger, though, so using it in smaller spaces isn't really viable. Can pretty much only be used on completely smooth, flat, large surfaces like the windshield.
customer_reviews.author: Kiran B.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Mount!
customer_reviews.text: This is a seriously impressive mount. I've mounted it to the outside of my car, and to my Harley on many occasions. It is very sturdy with amazing suction, I have no fear of losing my camera using this mount, even at speeds over 80 MPH (not on public roads of course.....). Cheaper than the GoPro brand, and well worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: LightningSVT

customer_reviews.title: The unit works great and funtions just a described.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and works just fine. However, although the suction cups definitely hold tight ... I suggest you also secure it with a rope, or whatever, just as a "fail safe" ... I almost lost my camera when I accidentally drove through some low hanging bushes. In other words I love it and suction cups work, but will alway have some sort of "back up", just in case!
customer_reviews.author: k. lauer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: I am ordering the suction cup gopro mount but keep on getting this wrong product. What on earth is going on here? Returned the first one, ordered another one and got the same wrong item. See picture.
customer_reviews.author: Shah

customer_reviews.title: IT SUCKS! NO LITERALLY IS SUCKS!
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Heavy duty. Great suction, thought about naming it after my ex. Taking with me to Scotland, going to be on the hood with a clear view through rough weather. Counting on it to get amazing footage along with my GoPro. Already used it during a thirty minute drive through a rain storm, time lapse it did great.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen davis

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY. My go pro is now gone.
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY THIS. i had it on my car, and it fell off. i couldnt find it, circle the street 3 times and never found my go pro with the mount. This is a piece of crap. I would like a refund for this and my go pro. this is the crappiest mount you can buy. save your money go for an expensive one.
customer_reviews.author: savannah

customer_reviews.title: Good price, held strongly.
customer_reviews.text: This cup works and looks just like the GoPro branded version. I used it to take video on my car during an autocross. As long at it wasn’t cold out and you applied a little water to the cup surface when using it, it held very well. There are a lot of fast, sharp changes of direction when autocrossing and this device held perfectly. For the price it was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my gopro and I have to tell you I am impressed with the quality of the mount and especially the suction cup. I have used this mount on the inside of my car and yes on the outside also. I am very confident with this mount and the suction cup strength is awesome. I have no worries when using this mount cause I know my gopro will not fall off with this mount.
customer_reviews.author: Techn' Moto

customer_reviews.title: Great suction and rock steady
customer_reviews.text: Worked great to mount my camera to the window in my racecar. Video was steady the whole way down the track with speeds over 140mph. Highly recommend. Video is taken while mounted with the suction cup mount.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor suction. Mount fell off.
customer_reviews.text: Stuck it to the hood of a Jeep. Fell off 5 minutes later. Almost ran over my go pro. Cleaned the hood before mounting. I tested the suction by pulling on the mount. It seemed to be sturdy but the road vibrations must have caused some sort of issue with the seal. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Josh B.

customer_reviews.title: Solid product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this suction cup for my Go Pro to be fixed in my motorbike. I was concern about the suction power, and besides the mount I held the camera with a cable, just in case. After the first use I'm not concerned anymore ! This product get really stuck to the bike, didn't move a millimeter, and held my camera very securely, even when I was going through very rough roads. The suction power is very strong, the best I have seen in this kind of product. I recommend it to anyone who needs to hold the camera to a slippery surface like painted areas, as in the outside of a car or a bike like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Fabiano Colella

customer_reviews.title: Really great mount!
customer_reviews.text: I'm really impressed with this suction cup mount. It holds firm and steady at highway speeds in Colorado (we have 75mph speed limits). I still use a tether for safety, but I doubt I'd need it. The suction is strong on glass and clean paint. It even holds on my car's plastics, but I'm hesitant to use it there at any highway speeds only because it's not a perfectly smooth surface. I've also used this for mounting a microphone and it does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: MonkeyTaco

customer_reviews.title: No suction
customer_reviews.text: Bought this suction camera holder for my trip and was very upset. This cute doesn’t good the camera as it is advertised. No suction at all and th device constantly fell from the dashboard. Very upset and my trip was ruined as I could shoot videos as planned.
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work at all.
customer_reviews.text: This thing won’t suction AT ALL!! To any surface. I’ve tried kitchen table, outside of car, inside of car (which was intended purpose), desk and it won’t suction to anything and if it does it will only suction for a second and then it falls. Worst $20 spent.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service.
customer_reviews.text: The initial suction cup I received broke where the cup is mounted to the actual mount. However, the company was quick to replace the item with one that had worked perfectly. I feel the initial item I received had some structural issues. The replacement I received works very well and I have not had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good piece, very good value...
customer_reviews.text: What's missing is the ability to mount/move in more than just x and y axis. It would be nice to not have to buy another piece to get more flexibility. But other than that I works great and does the job, at a better value than name brand items.
customer_reviews.author: shiparino

customer_reviews.title: First couple of uses works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought awhile ago and just started using it - the suction power works great against smooth fiberglass finish. The first couple of uses it works great and will update post the more I use it - hope the suction power stays over time will be a great mount
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: It was great while it lasted, but didn’t last long.
customer_reviews.text: Had it about 2 months and it worked perfectly. I would mount it on the glass behind my net and record my roller hockey games. I want to clarify that it was NEVER hit by a puck or stick nor did it lose suction and fall off the glass during any of the 10+ games I recorded. When I went to remove it after my last game, the suction cup and spring stayed on the glass, and the case broke away. I can say I’m not thrilled that after 2 months of use, I’m already looking for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Cowie

customer_reviews.title: Great price on this car mount
customer_reviews.text: Great price on this car mount. I was suspicious of the quality with a cheaper mount, but it is my first so I wanted to give it a go. I had the mount in various locations on the car, 10 runs total, at about 3 minutes per run and it worked perfectly every location I put it. On the outside glass, inside glass, fender, hood, everywhere. Super happy with this purchase. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan K

customer_reviews.title: Great mount! Used it inside our plane while flying
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Used it in our cockpit to record while we were flying and it worked WAY better than another brand I bought on Amazon a year or so ago with a smaller diameter suction cup. Very pleased and was impressed with how sturdy it is.
customer_reviews.author: rlsz

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product so far
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Sware GoPro suction cup mount for use on my Harley Road Glide when I take long road trips. Recently did a full day ride with the suction mount adhered to the front of my fairing....and even with rough roads, speeds up to 90 mph...the mount didn't budge a centimeter and my GoPro Hero 7 made it home safely. Would highly recommend...much less than the GroPro branded version and from what I can tell...very similar in quality and build.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1100+ Miles at Freeway Speeds
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Took two 550 mile trips at freeway speeds and stayed perfectly secure. For those saying it gets loose or doesn't even stick in the first place... You must have had a dirty surface or a hole in the suction cup - I had no issues whatsoever. Only con is the included tether is short enough that it might as well not exist - look into a longer tether.
customer_reviews.author: neo32843

customer_reviews.title: It broke after the first use
customer_reviews.text: Thankfully this held on as I had it mounted on my windshield as I drove slowly through a drive-through haunted trail, but as soon as I removed it, the spring and bottom part broke off. I returned it and bought an official Go-Pro brand suction cup mount.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Roseboom

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I was a little bit worried to use this mount because of how much cheaper it was than the GoPro one, but I learned that all you're paying for is the name. This mount worked fantastic, I had it mounted on my bumper for about 30hours on Tail of the Dragon. It never failed on me, and the videos all turned out great (video quality was not very shaky and had little to no vibration in the audio.)
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Holds Strong!
customer_reviews.text: Large suction cup base provides a wide contact area for safe mounting of a GoPro or Action camera. I tested the holding power by mounting it to my driver side door and drove down the freeway. The mount held strong. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a versatile suction mount!
customer_reviews.author: Dave West

customer_reviews.title: Does not swivel
customer_reviews.text: The image indicated that it would swivel - that's what the big arrow indicates to me. but it does not - no directions so have no idea what the extra bit of plastic tube is for. Suction will work on glass but that is about it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T

customer_reviews.title: Great for mounting to car, much better than flimsy smaller ones that come with “kits”
customer_reviews.text: Mounted on car fender and bumper for action GoPro videos. Works great, strong suction bond, stays put. I was a little hesitant at first and used a safety cord just in case, but after a few rounds I realized I didn’t need it. Super easy and fast to mount camera, versatile long arm and short arm attachments, easy to position camera for just the right angle for green screen backgrounds.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it’s supposed to do!
customer_reviews.text: This was used for a go pro camera, mounted on the outside of a car windshield. The car was driven in speeds of up to 65 mph, and it held like a champ. The pictures were clear, and used for their intended purpose. All in all, it does exactly what it’s said it will do. Absolutely no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: JRH55

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: These work great enough that I bought two of them. I use them to mount my phone and GoPro inside my car during track events. I've stuck them to the windshield, the targa roof (lexan) and the rear hatch glass which has a bumpy texture to it but it still holds on! I have not tried these outside the car but I bet they would work pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive...and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the suction cup once on our boat. No question, I was a little freaked out at first...had visions of having to fish my Hero 7 Black from the bottom of the lake. But NO! It was perfect and gave us a perspective we’ve never seen before. Inexpensive...and worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew F.

customer_reviews.title: Happy it stayed on my bike fairing
customer_reviews.text: Used it on my Harley fairing in Hawaii, thought it would come loose with vibration and the humidity but never had a problem. Left it attached for a little over 24 hours and still as tight as when I put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Rockrunner

customer_reviews.title: Much beefier thanI expected
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to hold the gopro in the airplane window during flights. It's excellent quality but frankly i wanted something smaller. There's already too much junk in my flight bag and this is a big suction cup. This is great for mounting on the OUTSIDE of the airplane on a wing strut or underside in front of the tail.
customer_reviews.author: dsulli32937

customer_reviews.title: This thing sucks (pun intended)
customer_reviews.text: I just received my second unit for my spare vehicle. I've had this thing a couple months and it's been excellent with no issues to report. I think this is an absolute excellent product for the money! Update 9/23/2018 First one gave in to the heat... About 2 weeks ago it fell off my windshield while I was driving my truck. As you can see in the pictures, it broke the plastic tab and the unit is ruined. Kind of bummed since it started off so well.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Beatty Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great mount!
customer_reviews.text: Normally I don't write reviews, but I was really impressed with how well this mount worked so I have to share. I have had friends gopros fall of their car while driving so I also purchased a safety strap which after using this mount it was not necessary, but a peace of mind. The construction of the mount is very durable, does not feel cheap whatsoever. Good adjustability and did not even budge even at speeds around 120mph. If you're looking for a good mount, this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Love this suction cup for motorcycles !!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this suction cup for motorcycles !!! Took to the track as I have 2 cameras and needed another mount. This worked perfectly on the motorcycle track. Suction cup is very strong like the original GoPro mount i have different shape and design but same size suction cup on bottom and just as strong. With it came with the extra screw mount adapter but besides that does what it is supposed to love it.
customer_reviews.author: Q. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Met and exceded expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Came shipped within 2 days per my prime account. Came in a bubble lined white envelope. The packaging was of high quality with thick clear plastic. I use this multi purpose device with a addon phone holder in my shower to watch news as I shower. My phone is in a waterproof lifeproof case. The suction is actually great even on my shower tile. The plastic is thick and not cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Bracket broke 2nd use
customer_reviews.text: suction cup holds well but the actual base bracket around the cup broke the second time I tried using it. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar A. Poe

customer_reviews.title: Put out the money for the GoPro brand not this knockoff
customer_reviews.text: Mounted this to the hood of our Polaris Ranger Atv for some trail runs Properly cleaned the mounting surfce and all seemed solid. Later we noticed it was gone and I now no longer have a GoPro. Do not buy this. Spend the money and time for the actual Gopro version of this.
customer_reviews.author: RobbieC3

customer_reviews.title: Good and reliable mount
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mount for a fraction of the cost of the official version. The plastic is sturdy, it comes with adapters to change the orientation of your camera based on your shooting scenario. The suction cup is really soft and sticks to any surface. Tried it on a window, a car and a bike - holds great. Great product, thanks a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Dmytro

customer_reviews.title: Well secure mount.
customer_reviews.text: Works as described ran it thru tests. Once I was was in middle of severe rain storm, had it mounted on truck no issues at all. Second time clear dry day. Both times was doing highway speeds 55-65mph.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Roth

customer_reviews.title: It holds!
customer_reviews.text: Product attaches to my vehicle securely! I have no doubt this thing would stay put in some pretty rough terrain, the suction is absolutely incredible, a bit hard to get off actually! Definitely recommend for those unique gopro shots where you can attach this guy.
customer_reviews.author: techniKal

customer_reviews.title: Car mount as good as the Big name brand one.
customer_reviews.text: This look, felt and functions just like the GoPro suction cup mount. I own both and I don’t have any doubt that my equipment is Safely secured to my vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Pwr Stroke

customer_reviews.title: Great little mount
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this a few times so far, but I'm really impressed by it. I play hockey and use it mounted to the glass behind my net, it feels sturdy, it has a low profile so its not obstructive, and it seems the suction cup is slightly oversized from my previous mounts. This suction cup is strong enough to hold the ISS in space, its insane. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: ArizonaRedneck

customer_reviews.title: It works and costing cost that much
customer_reviews.text: It stuck to my tailgate glass well, up to 70 mph without losing grip... for an exhaust note video. It does vibrate a tad and you can hear on the video
customer_reviews.author: AngryAsianMan

customer_reviews.title: Lost my new Gopro 8 suction popped off the boat
customer_reviews.text: Well if you thought the floaty was going to keep the camera and the suction cup above water... think again. Darn thing sunk like a box of rocks. I was surfing off the back of the boat and watched it pop off. I jumped off the board after it but it sunk so fast I didn't make it on time.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Melted
customer_reviews.text: I had this attached to my windshield and on a hot day it melted, deformed. Now after re attaching it again it bounces a lot since it does not sit quite right.
customer_reviews.author: Ross G. Dubin

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, overkill suction power
customer_reviews.text: Soooooo much better than the gopro cup and any other in this price range that ive seen or encountered. You would never need this much suction but its good to have i guess. Ide put a dslr on this guy no problem. Its cool how u can make it low profile or not.
customer_reviews.author: RallySoob

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty for it's price and size
customer_reviews.text: This is a very heavy duty suction cup. Much better quality than what I was expecting to get. Stays on the inside of my windshield even throughout a hot summer day with 90+ temperatures, worked great staying on the outside of my window around corners too. I have gotten a couple products from SublimeWare now and have yet to be disappointed. Going to be getting a lot of use out of this, and not just with my car, so far it has worked on every glossy surface I've tried it on.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: versatile
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tested it on the side of my vehicle. When I configure a safety cable I will do that. I do not want to lose my GoPro! On the plus side, it is inexpensive and versatile.
customer_reviews.author: JRL

customer_reviews.title: GoPro Windshield Mount
customer_reviews.text: Just got into the GoPro world and we were going to New England to site see. Thought this might be fun to capture some of the drive sites. This works like a charm. Never once did it come off the glass. Easy to use. The only suggestion I might give to the manufacturer would be one more articulation. I did have to place my camera upside down but it really didn't cause a problem. All in all still a five star product. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: RRmusiclover

customer_reviews.title: Great for profession use—stable & uses minimal space
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to mount a GoPro for a professional project with a client. This suction mount worked better than the clip mount I already had—super stable! Extreme suction, & it never once slid or budged. Footage was as stable as one could get in a moving vehicle. The unit used minimal space. Plan to order several more soon!!
customer_reviews.author: Veronika

customer_reviews.title: Suction Is fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely Impressed with the suction on this product. I was really worried about it Peeling off the paint on my truck since I have a Great paint job. This is a perfect product if you want to mount this to your vehicle. This things really sticks. Be sure to Clean off the material your sticking it to first.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Needs some improvement with the suction cup button it rattles when being used while driving
customer_reviews.text: I've used the suction cup on my car to try and do some shots of my exhaust and the button rattles so the camera picks it up in the sound that is my only complaint. I believe I can do something about this. The mount is very secure when stuck to every place I've mounted it I haven't tried it without the waterproof casing yet. Over all it's a good product for the price and I'm happy that you're bringing jobs to the US especially Pennsylvania I know things got a bit hard over there
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for me
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this as an internal car mount for a GoPro Hero7 Black and it has been rock-solid. Can't speak to it vs. the OEM version but not sure what you could improve upon here at this price point. Will buy again for a 2nd camera!
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first due to the price and the lack of brand recognition. Well, I am pleasantly surprised that my skepticism was wrong. The suction cup of it is solid. I attached it to the outside door of my car to shoot a video and to kind of test it out and it withheld me going 80mph. (I did tie a string to my GoPro just in case the suction sure sucked. ). Additionally, I loved the ability to position my camera in different angles to achieve the best video. Great product, excellent price, worth the cash
customer_reviews.author: B. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Insane suction
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for secure, insane suction look no further this is it. I've used it on my windshield on my hood and on car doors, it holds very well. Very good quality plastic. Love it so much I bought another one to keep in my work truck. Tried 2 other brands, this is by far the best, suction for days.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Cravalho Jr

customer_reviews.title: This thing sucks!! (In a good way)
customer_reviews.text: If you want a mount to attach your camera to almost anything flat then stop reading this and click add to cart. I’m a firefighter and this thing has kept my camera on the outside of a fire truck going down the road no problem at all. It sucks so good it’s hard to get off!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Bottom line, this thing does not work...I would say it sucks, but in a very bad way...
customer_reviews.author: D.A. Rangel

customer_reviews.title: Fear Not-This Really Holds
customer_reviews.text: If you need to use this suction unit in ANY direction...it will hold! I used it inside, outside, facing up, facing down...never budged. In fact sometimes it grabbed on to the surface even BEFORE I anchored it down. Lots of angles available to position it. I added my spare connectors and was able to control every view I needed. Go(Pro) for it!
customer_reviews.author: Darryl F. Albert

customer_reviews.title: Good mount, maneuverability is limited
customer_reviews.text: great mount if you mount the GoPro and don't need to move/rotate it. the mounts can be positioned at 90 degree intervals so adjusting the camera angle it limited without removing the mount from the surface and rotating it. If that's what you need its a great mount.
customer_reviews.author: wcc963

customer_reviews.title: It works as well as the Go Pro version and it's less expensive.
customer_reviews.text: So far I've only used it once, I mounted a go pro to video the front wheel of my car. The suction cup mount held well and was easy to mount and remove when I finished.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Floria

customer_reviews.title: Best mount around
customer_reviews.text: Love this mount. Held up just fine when i was 80+mph on the highway. Easy to use and very budget friendly. I will be buying more
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Good unit, keep the bolts tight!
customer_reviews.text: Hey this is a decent unit for the price. BUT the main nut backed off and lost the bolt while it was mounted outside the car. I was lucky I noticed it and grabbed the camera before we lost it. It was probably my fault for not re checking it during the shoot. But that was a close call for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Harris

customer_reviews.title: really good and works despite my worries
customer_reviews.text: How smart is it to mount a $400 product outside of your reach? I dont know but this guarantees that it won't fall. Have taken it several times on the road with my jeep off road and stuck like glue the whole time. Didn't even adjust my camera angle. I only wish it came with a rotational attachment but i could probably buy that elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: edwin v

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: I traveled along with it more than 200 miles and I use it with gopro 6 , I put it on the roof of the car ..
customer_reviews.author: Majdi E.A. Awad

customer_reviews.title: Ready for Boating
customer_reviews.text: This product was great! We used it on the back of a motor boat to record folks water skiing and tubing. The suction cup held on like a charm, even with the crazy vibrations from the boat engine and the rock of the wake.
customer_reviews.author: Pumpkin Spice

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service.
customer_reviews.text: First package arrived intact and in good condition but main mounting screw was missing from inside sealed product. Customer service accepted my claim and I got a new package with all components as described. Overall quality of this product is very good. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Strength, Well Built
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son because he loves to stick his action camera on windows. This has worked like a charm and it seems very durable, which is very important to me because at age 13, he can be hard on equipment. I'd definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Brent Hetland

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR AIRCRAFT!!! Lost go pro 8
customer_reviews.text: In the description it says good for airplanes. This is BS. Lost a go pro 8. Contacted sublime ware NO RESPONSE. F these guys.
customer_reviews.author: JULIAN HOGAN

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I used this while doing autoX racing with my car. Suction cup held on nice and tight.
customer_reviews.author: kenny dow

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first mount like this as I am new to the GoPro world. I am impressed! I had it on the outside of my car down the drag strip at 100 mph, on my Jeep 4 wheeling through the mountains, on my windshield for a 5 hours mountain cruise and on the inside of my windshield as a dash cam. It didn’t budge one bit. Definitely worth every dime in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Corey

customer_reviews.title: So far so good with this product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with this product. I was a little weary of buying the "off brand" version, but the suction cup is awesome quality. No issues whatsoever with glass, plastic, or even smooth concrete. I'll update this review if anything changes, but I would definitely buy this one again. Awesome quality.
customer_reviews.author: B. M. B.

customer_reviews.title: Fell off.....
customer_reviews.text: I put it on the outside of windshield, I did clean the windshield before attach it. I was trying to take some scenic footage driving no faster than 30 mph, and it fell off, I have had a tether lanyard on it so the camera didn't flyaway but it bang into car fender and made a ding. The suction cup doesn't hold too strong, I don't recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Hal

customer_reviews.title: Sticks awesome
customer_reviews.text: Used it on my car at the race track and it’s super sturdy, filming on hero camera is excellent. Very much worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Works good at highspeeds.
customer_reviews.text: I use this suction cup and mount it outside to record Highspeed runs with the gopro attached. I had not yet had it fly off. I just recommend to clean the surface well and it be very smooth at flat. Very sturdy and made with great material.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Magana

customer_reviews.title: Great but for the money
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a suction cup mount and wanting to save a little money, this is the one for you. Suction cup is strong and sticks well to any relatively smooth/flat surface. I especially like how it came with different lengths of mounts for different GoPro needs. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jpark128

customer_reviews.title: I lost my go pro beware
customer_reviews.text: The suction cup worked great for a couple trips. I mounted it on the front faring of my bike it went through rain, cold and heat with no issues until it fell off. I would put a tether on it if I was to use this product again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best you can buy for money
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional video producer and use these for action shots on drag cars. The quality is amazing and i really cant tell the difference between these and the exact same GoPro brand that costs almost 3 times as much.
customer_reviews.author: DroneSouthdotCom

customer_reviews.title: Skip
customer_reviews.text: Fell off in less than 3 minutes. Moistened the cup and placed on clean portion of windshield. Not enough mechanical advantage with suction cup.
customer_reviews.author: John Frank

customer_reviews.title: It worked
customer_reviews.text: Surprised by this hold. Suction cupped this bad boy to a racing helmet and went go-karting.
customer_reviews.author: Paulio

customer_reviews.title: The suction cup is solid
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this suction cup mount because I wanted to record my son’s Hockey Games. The Suction mount is great because it allows me the flexibility to mount the camera on the arena glass no matter what the condition and it holds well. I cal also get any angle I want. Very pleased with the product. It also arrived on time as promised so great customer service also
customer_reviews.author: Nene

customer_reviews.title: OK product for price, but some  limitations
customer_reviews.text: Pretty well made for the price, but the design is a bit clumsy. Lack of ability to swivel or rotate the camera limits the possible mounting positions.
customer_reviews.author: Objective Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Rigid mount- perfect for camera use.
customer_reviews.text: This mount is very rigid when installed. It holds a GoPro camera very steadfast. I’m very satisfied with the quality and service this product provides.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works ok for light duty
customer_reviews.text: Suction is pretty good. It doesn’t hold up well to the heavy bouncing when used off-road. Light off-roading it’s fine. Need to find a permanent mount to make sure the cam stays put over the roughest terrain
customer_reviews.author: Cski

product_meta.title: Suction Cup for Gopro Mount Car Windshield Window Vehicle Boat Camera Holder for Gopro Suction Cup Mount Windshield Mount - for GoPro Max 360 Hero 8 Black Hero 7 Hero6 Hero5 Hero4 HD by SublimeWare
feature_bullets: [NEWEST MODEL]- New Generation Suction Cup Mount GoPro with improve design that can extend the arm angle, suction lock handle PULLS DOWN instead of UP, exact same quality and design as the official GoPro Suction Cup Mount AUCMT-302

[UNIQUE OUTSIDE VEHICLE POV] - With the industrial strength GoPro Suction Cup mount that can suction with industrial strength to any body of a carbon fiber vehicle, can act as a GoPro windshield mount and GoPro boat mount. Imagine taking a scenic video of your favorite route by placing the GoPro Suction Cup Mount on your windshield as gopro windshield mount or on the body of your hood as gopro car mount outside

[9 CM SUCTION DIAMETER = STRONG SUCTION and STABLE] - With the new compact design you can mount your action camera closer to the surface to minimize vibrations. The strength of the suction thoroughly tested. The diameter of the suction is 9 CM!
[WIDE MOTION] - The main adjustable arm moves at an unimpeded 270 degree and it comes with an adaptor that can move the camera in variety of angles, more flexible than other gopro suction cup mounts

[WORKS FOR ALL GOPRO MODEL] This Gopro Suction Cup is unviersal for all GoPro Cameras including the latest models, which includes GoPro Max 360, Hero 8 Black, Hero 7, Hero 6, Hero 5, Hero 4 and earlier models. This Hero 8 Black suction cup works for GoPro Cameras which have the folding fingers at the bottom.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars780 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
